messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help with armor
messages.msgSnippet: the do was worn across the cheast in a simmilar to the european curass. tsukaboku  wrote: I was looking to complete my list of the names
messages.messageBody:
the do was worn across the cheast in a simmilar to the european curass.


tsukaboku <eiroku24@...> wrote:
I was looking to complete my list of the names of the pieces of
armor the samurai wore into battle, so far (please forgive
mispellings) i have kabuto, weapon, sune, and a couple others i cant
remember, if you guys could help me complete this list and english
translations of where it was worn. Domo Arigato

messages.messageBody:
I was looking to complete my list of the names of the pieces of
armor the samurai wore into battle, so far (please forgive
mispellings) i have kabuto, weapon, sune, and a couple others i cant
remember, if you guys could help me complete this list and english
translations of where it was worn. Domo Arigato
